document_data.name: Hammers
document_data.Organization: They were four in number They consisted of hand-selected elite veteran warriors.
document_data.Possessions: The Hammers rode heavily armored war-[[horse]]s.
document_data.Activities: Once a year, when the marchion rode south after the meeting of the [[Council of Sparkling Stones]], he took two Hammers with him, and left the other two behind as war captains.
